overview.title: Welcome to the Future of Pet Shop Management

hero.title: Transform Your Pet Shop
hero.description: Revolutionize your operations with Whiskr - a cutting-edge ecosystem that combines powerful admin management with an innovative mobile marketplace designed for dedicated pet owners.

features.title: Comprehensive Admin Features
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed to streamline your pet shop operations and boost efficiency

adminFeatures.title: Smart Dashboard
adminFeatures.subtitle: Real-time Business Intelligence:
adminFeatures.description: Monitor total revenue, today's sales, pending orders, and low stock alerts instantly.
features: Live revenue tracking and daily sales comparison
Order status overview (Pending, Confirmed, Processing, Delivered)
Low stock product alerts with quantity indicators
Recent customer orders with quick status updates

adminFeatures.title: Advanced Inventory Management
adminFeatures.subtitle: Complete Product Lifecycle Control:
adminFeatures.description: Manage your entire product catalog with intelligent categorization and real-time tracking.
features: Smart search and filter by category, stock level, or status
Add/edit products with images, descriptions, and pricing
Stock quantity tracking with visual indicators
Bulk operations for mass updates and deletions
Product status management (Active/Inactive)

adminFeatures.title: Intelligent Order Processing
adminFeatures.subtitle: Seamless Mobile App Integration:
adminFeatures.description: Process orders with full lifecycle management and real-time tracking.
features: Order status workflow: Pending → Confirmed → Processing → Shipped → Delivered
Customer information display (name, email, phone)
Order details with item breakdown and totals
Order history tracking and search functionality
List and grid view options for different preferences

adminFeatures.title: Business Analytics & Insights
adminFeatures.subtitle: Data-Driven Decision Making:
adminFeatures.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard with revenue trends, order statistics, and product performance metrics.
features: Revenue overview with daily, weekly, and monthly comparisons
Order statistics by status and time periods
Product performance tracking and top sellers
Low stock monitoring and reorder suggestions
Sales trend analysis with customizable time ranges

adminFeatures.title: Enterprise Security
adminFeatures.subtitle: Professional Access Control:
adminFeatures.description: Secure authentication system with role-based permissions and comprehensive data protection.
features: Secure login with email and password authentication
User session management and automatic logout
Role-based access control for different user types
Profile management and user preferences
Secure API communication with backend systems

adminFeatures.title: Universal Accessibility
adminFeatures.subtitle: Work From Anywhere:
adminFeatures.description: Beautiful, responsive design that adapts perfectly to all devices and screen sizes.
features: Responsive design that works on all screen sizes
Touch-friendly interface for mobile devices
Cross-browser compatibility (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge)
Fast loading times and smooth animations
Offline capability for basic functions

mobileApp.title: Whiskr Mobile App
mobileApp.subtitle: A complete ecosystem that includes a powerful mobile app for pet owners. Your customers get a comprehensive pet management solution while you benefit from seamless order processing and customer engagement.

features.title: Pet Profile Management
features.subtitle: Complete Digital Pet Records:
features.description: Store detailed pet information including breed, age, weight, medical history, and photo galleries.
features: Multiple pet profiles with detailed information
Photo gallery and QR code generation
Profile sharing with family and veterinarians
Breed-specific information and recommendations

features.title: AI-Powered Nutrition & Diet
features.subtitle: Smart Meal Planning:
features.description: Track meals, analyze nutrition patterns, and receive AI-generated meal plans based on breed, weight, and health conditions.
features: AI meal plan generation based on pet specifics
Food journal with portion and calorie tracking
Weight monitoring with trend analysis
Custom recipe storage and meal scheduling

features.title: Health & Wellness Tracking
features.subtitle: Complete Health Management:
features.description: Track vaccinations, medications, vet visits, and daily activities with smart reminders.
features: Medical records and vaccination tracking
Medication reminders and schedules
Activity monitoring and exercise logging
Veterinary appointment management

features.title: Smart Calendar & Reminders
features.subtitle: Never Miss Important Events:
features.description: Comprehensive calendar system for appointments, feeding schedules, and activities.
features: Appointment scheduling and management
Recurring event setup (walks, feeding)
Notification system for reminders
Calendar sharing with family members

features.title: Parks & Location Services
features.subtitle: Discover Pet-Friendly Places:
features.description: Find nearby parks, pet services, and dog-friendly locations with interactive maps and reviews.
features: Interactive maps with pet-friendly locations
Park reviews and rating system
Check-in functionality and social sharing
Directions and location services

features.title: Integrated Pet Shop Experience
features.subtitle: Seamless Shopping Integration:
features.description: Browse and order pet products directly from the app with real-time sync to your admin panel.
features: Browse product catalog by category
Add items to cart and place orders
Order tracking and status updates
Integration with admin panel for processing

features.title: Lost & Found Network
features.subtitle: Community Safety Net:
features.description: Quick alert system for lost pets with location tracking and community support features.
features: Quick lost pet alert creation
Location tracking and sightings
Community support and notifications
Found pet reporting and matching

features.title: Social Pet Community
features.subtitle: Connect with Fellow Pet Owners:
features.description: Join a vibrant community of pet lovers to share experiences and build connections.
features: Pet social networking features
Playdate arrangement and meetups
Photo sharing and community forums
Local pet event discovery

hero.title: The Game-Changing Opportunity
hero.description: Whiskr Mobile is designed as a comprehensive pet management app that will attract dedicated pet owners. When you join the Whiskr ecosystem, your pet shop will be prominently featured in the app's "Services" section.
hero.futureDescription: As Whiskr mobile users engage with pet care and actively manage their pets' needs, your shop will be there as a featured service provider. You'll have direct access to this highly targeted audience of engaged pet owners.

advantages.title: First-Mover Advantage
advantages.description: Be among the first pet shops featured when Whiskr Mobile launches, establishing your business as a founding partner and trusted service provider.

advantages.title: Pre-Qualified Customer Base
advantages.description: The app is designed to attract users who are deeply invested in their pets' wellbeing, making them ideal customers for pet products and services.

advantages.title: Seamless Integration
advantages.description: Orders from mobile users flow directly into your admin panel for processing - no additional platforms needed.

advantages.title: Smart Recommendations
advantages.description: The app's AI features create natural opportunities for product recommendations based on pets' specific needs.

ecosystem.title: How the Ecosystem Works
ecosystem.description: Your gateway to a revolutionary pet care ecosystem

components.title: Whiskr Mobile Users
components.description: Dedicated pet owners using the app for comprehensive pet management, health tracking, and nutrition planning.

components.title: Your Pet Shop
components.description: Featured prominently in the Services section, giving you prime visibility to motivated pet owners in your market.

ecosystem.pipeline: Direct integration ensures seamless order flow from customer to your admin panel, creating an efficient and professional experience.

reasons.title: Data-Driven Targeting
reasons.description: Leverage detailed pet profiles for personalized product recommendations based on breed, age, and health conditions.

reasons.title: Perfect Timing
reasons.description: Appear at crucial moments when users track supplies or schedule pet care activities.

reasons.title: Trust & Convenience
reasons.description: Benefit from the established trust users have in the Whiskr platform for their pet care needs.

reasons.title: Network Effect
reasons.description: Growing platform value as more shops and pet owners join the ecosystem.

dailyOperations.title: Daily Operations Workflow
dailyOperations.subtitle: Streamlined processes designed for efficiency and growth

benefits.title: Quantifiable Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Measurable improvements for your business operations

metrics.title: Time Savings
metrics.description: Daily time saved with automated inventory tracking and streamlined order processing.

metrics.title: Increased Revenue
metrics.description: Sales boost through better stock management and improved customer service.

metrics.title: Data-Driven Decisions
metrics.description: Comprehensive analytics for informed business decisions and growth planning.

metrics.title: Mobile Integration
metrics.description: Access and process orders anytime, anywhere with seamless mobile integration.

metrics.title: Scalability
metrics.description: Unlimited growth potential with robust infrastructure and flexible scaling.

metrics.title: Professional Security
metrics.description: Top-tier security with role-based access control and data protection.

contact.title: Ready to Be a Founding Partner?
contact.description: Don't just get an admin system - become a founding partner in an innovative marketplace designed to connect dedicated pet owners with trusted services. With Whiskr, you'll be positioned at the forefront of a revolutionary pet care ecosystem, ready to serve motivated pet owners from day one.

brand.name: Whiskr
brand.description: Complete Pet Shop Management Ecosystem - connecting pet owners with trusted service providers.
